#Read in UCI Data

#Tidyverse Read in Data
```{r}
#same work done using tidyverse functions
mat <- read_delim("student-mat.csv", delim = ";", col_names = TRUE)
por <- read_delim("student-por.csv", delim = ";", col_names = TRUE)

#result is many to many join - these fields are not specific enough
fulldata <- inner_join(mat, por, by = join_by("school","sex","age","address","famsize","Pstatus","Medu","Fedu","Mjob","Fjob","reason","nursery","internet"))

#join by every field except response variables
fulldata_final <- inner_join(mat, por, by = names(select(mat,everything(), -c("G1","G2","G3","paid","absences"))))

```
